title: Paris Université Club (rugby union)
text:
The Paris Université Club (PUC) is a French <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> club based in <a href="Paris">Paris</a>.
It is the rugby section of the omnisport club (<a href="Paris%20universit%C3%A9%20club">PUC</a>).
In 2012–2013 it played in the <a href="F%C3%A9d%C3%A9rale%202">Fédérale 2</a> championship (the fourth level of rugby union in France).
Famous players.
<a href="Chris%20Ralston">Chris Ralston</a>
